summary:
This mod changes image and music on main menu
Music - Halls of Sovngarde (wait a while for it)
Image - Land Of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Name : Main menu Overhaul
Author : NikolQe
Version : v1

Nothing more, nothing less, changes the image and music of main menu :)
Just wait a sec. until the epic music brings up
More images and music coming soon ! Track !
____________________________________________________________________
Tools used :
Photoshop - Converting image to DDS
